Description:
PICTURESQUE AND PERFECTLY POSITIONED
This immaculately refurbished block-fronted Victorian residence close to the Village, schools, station and Yarra parklands is sure to please! In one of the areas most charming streets, the house opens from a verandah to an arched hallway, from which run two double bedrooms, with open fireplaces flanked by new built-in wardrobes. The central living and dining room, handsomely proportioned, has a fine ebonised overmantel and the original timber dado. The kitchen, with ample storage space and timber benchtops, adjoins a white-tiled bathroom/laundry. To the rear, an expansive 2-level pergola-covered deck provides secluded year-round outdoor living space. Featuring polished Baltic floors, timber dado work, open fireplaces and split-system heating and cooling throughout, this light-filled property is a Clifton Hill classic.
Insights: 16 other 2 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
PRIZED DUAL STREET FRONTAGE
'GLENCOE' C1910. Enviably located, impeccable throughout, and boasting a flexible floor plan, this handsome Edwardian is sure to delight those in search of a period home with warmth, charm, and modern functionality. The accommodation includes 3 bedrooms, upstairs study/4th bedroom with sweeping views of the city skyline, sitting room with OFP, updated bathroom with spa bath, separate laundry, and a spacious, light-filled kitchen/meals with glass atrium overlooking an immaculate landscaped rear with remote OSP from Clifton Avenue.
Incl; hydronic heating, A/C, and extensive storage.

Description:
A Peaceful Retreat
This bright and spacious town house is one of an exclusive group of four only, tucked away quietly in a sought after residential pocket close the Merri Creek and Yarra Parklands. Value packed accommodation includes two living areas, two double bedrooms - each with own walk-in-robe and master bedroom also providing an ensuite - sparkling bathroom, separate laundry and large well-appointed kitchen. The kitchen opens to a sunny paved and landscaped courtyard garden. Further features include a secure lock-up garage, ducted heating, air-conditioning and a location close to Clifton Hill Primary School. If a relaxed and maintenance free lifestyle is what you seek, just settle in and enjoy!
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466

Description:
The Essence Of City Edge Excellence
One of only seven residences to occupy an evocative, brilliantly converted warehouse building, this dual level apartment delivers designer style both inside and out. Northern light flows across generous terrace areas to fill large living/dining spaces featuring gas log fireplace, polished floorboards, bi-fold doors and a contemporary kitchen equipped with stone benches, Bosch dishwasher and efficient storage. Upstairs, a main bedroom with walk in robes and fully tiled, double vanity ensuite sets the benchmark for two additional bedrooms, each opening to a sunny balcony, both including built in robes. A central bathroom, also fully tiled and beautifully appointed, completes ideal accommodation. Reverse cycle heating/cooling in every room ensures comfort. Security entrance preserves privacy. Secure garage parking for two cars adds exceptional convenience close to Clifton Hill station, village cafes, Quarries Park and Darling Gardens.
Jason Sharpe : 0438 847 700

Description:
FULLY RENOVATED CITY-EDGE DELIGHT!
This solid-brick home reveals a tastefully modernised interior delivering a high-quality, low-maintenance lifestyle in a prime Clifton Hill location close to cafes, parks and transport. Light-filled interior comprises two large bedrooms (both with robes) and stylish central bathroom, open-design living/dining area and superb modern kitchen complete with timber benchtops and stainless steel appliances. Other features of the home include ducted heating and split-system a/c, European laundry, polished timber floors, plus a landscaped rear courtyard garden with decked area, central lawn, handy storeroom and secure off-street parking option via ROW. Ideally positioned in one of inner-Melbournes favourite neighbourhoods, its close to Merri Creek trails and Dights Falls, local parks, primary school and trains to the CBD.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Superb Living In Village Cul-de-Sac
Outstanding lifestyle rewards are instantly evident with this fabulous 1920s residence conveying character and quality with an irresistible presence on a highly-coveted cul-de-sac. Stylishly updated creating a warm and welcoming modern ambience, generously-proportioned interior spaces deliver complete comfort through to the delightful rear garden with its pleasing emphasis on private entertaining. This double-fronted timber home offers the room you require to enjoy now then evolve to suit changing needs in a central village location near schools, shops, trains and expansive Yarra parkland and trails. Offers two double bedrooms with built-in-robes, two smart bathrooms (ensuite), living room, large dining adjoining superb Smeg-equipped kitchen, reverse-cycle heating/cooling, gleaming hardwood floorboards and covered alfresco deck.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
INNER CITY CHIC
In a converted warehouse building, this spacious, fully appointed and rebuilt apartment offers accommodation that is rarely found in such a spectacular inner city location. Within easy access to public transport, parklands and Queens Parade shopping and soaked in spectacular northern light, the apartment offers every modern convenience and is sure to be one of the best buying decisions you ever make. Accommodation includes a large bedroom with built in storage, spacious open plan living and dining, galley style kitchen, secure garage car parking spot with remote access & a lockup storage room. Further features include polished concrete floors, air conditioning/heating, courtyard area and an enviable location.

Description:
Executive three bedroom townhouse with flexible floor plan
ATTENTION investors
- Stylish 3 bedrooms - 2 x BIRs, 2 x full ensuite
- 3 bathrooms - third central with bath
- Centralised kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless Steele Miele appliances and dishwasher
- Sun-filled open plan, separate living and dining area with two private balconies
- European laundry
- Polish floorboards, reverse cycle heating/cooling, electric heating, quality fixtures and fittings, plenty of storage
- Lock up garage for one car
- Month to Month tenancy - tenant most keen to secure longer lease. Rental return $2,950 approximately on a calendar month
- ENTER VIA NOONE STREET
Close proximately to Mayor's Park, Clifton Hill Station, Collingwood Leisure Centre, Darling Gardens, Quarries Park, Spensley Street Primary School, Clifton Hill Primary School and St. John's Primary School.
Property Code: 4409

Description:
First Class Freestanding Edwardian Entertainer
Stunning contemporary quality and style merges beautifully through this excellent freestanding Edwardian in a premier position near hectares of Yarra parkland and trails. The classic facade in a leafy setting precedes a flowing floorplan of two double bedrooms (built-in-robes) highlighted by an American Oak kitchen with AEG induction cooktop and sliding pantry plus indulging central bathroom with frameless shower and Apaiser stone bath. Also offers fretted hallway, alfresco breakfast deck, living and dining area opening to wonderful, private entertainers' garden with retractable awning, laundry, ducted heating, air-conditioning, Jetmaster open fireplace, alarm system and polished floorboards. The number one choice for polish, perfection and position close to cafes, shops and train station.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
SPACIOUS CONTEMPORARY YARRA-EDGE STYLE
What a location! Just minutes from Yarra walking tracks and Village cafes, this near-new 2 level contemporary residence offers spacious & secure low maintenance living at its best. Oriented to maximise natural light, the quality light-filled accommodation comprises U/S: a stylish kitchen with premium appliances & stone bench tops, adjacent vast open plan living and dining zones with glass doors flowing to a large northerly balcony. D/S: two double bedrooms both with built in robes & both opening to a private landscaped courtyard, large ensuite bathroom plus stylish second central bathroom (bath) and a separate full-size laundry. Other features include a secure garage (remote) with internal entry plus extra car space for 2nd car, generous storage, polished timber floors, split-system air conditioning and solar power. This highly appealing low maintenance property would make for the perfect home or investment!
Insights: 16 other 2 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
EXTENDED TERRACE OFFERS AN IDYLLIC VILLAGE LIFESTYLE!
With its gorgeous facade, feature-packed interior and the convenience of dual-street frontage, this Victorian beauty presents a fantastic living environment in the very heart of Clifton Hill Village. Stylish interior comprises two double bedrooms (both with robes) and modern central bathroom, updated kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, spacious open-plan living/dining area with full-width bi-folds to a surprisingly deep back garden complete with brick-paved entertaining area and secure carport (remote) to George Street behind. Other highlights include ducted heating, European laundry, open fireplace and high ornate ceilings. A fabulous home with nothing to do but move in and enjoy brilliantly located close to Clifton Hill Station, parks and trails, Queens Parade shops, cafes and trams.

Description:
Flexible Family Retreat Near Parkland
A family seeking space and convenience in a central inner-city location will be drawn to the size and flexibility of this attractive solid brick post-Edwardian just metres to Darling Gardens. This superbly renovated three bedroom retreat with bright attic study (or huge fourth bedroom), light-filled extension and double-glazing enjoys secluded alfresco areas, garden aspects and ROW access. Combining period splendour and contemporary style, the layout offers bay windowed living room with pressed metal ceiling and open fireplace, family/meals area opening to decking, stone kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, stylish bathroom, laundry and second WC, gas heating, polished floorboards and raintank. Walk to it all including schools, shops, cafes, recreation centre, trams and Clifton Hill station.

Description:
Perennial Charm, Modern Comfort, Prized Convenience
Both inside and outdoors there's a wonderful feel and fabulous look about this delightful semi-detached terrace tastefully enhanced for relaxed inner-city enjoyment. Wander to Queens Parade cafes, across to elegant Darling Gardens or stroll to Smith Street, swimming pool and trams from this attractive Victorian with a generous two double bedroom (robes) floorplan flowing through French doors to a secluded courtyard garden and peaceful covered alfresco deck. Sure to inspire at the heart of the home is a superb stone kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and dual-drawer dishwasher that serves a spacious living/dining room. Also features stylish bathroom and laundry, heating and cooling, timber floors, open fireplaces, classical ceilings, arched hallway and stained glass windows.

Address: Rear 5 Spensley Street CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068
Description:
Live, Work, Dream
Make your mark with this creative space.
This rare offering of a
three-level blank canvas on its own title can be your own creation.
Located on the city fringe, this warehouse residence consists of a large workshop and garage with grand possibilities - extend upward (subject to council approval) to reveal stunning city views.
Work from home or enjoy countless happy weekends tinkering in the workshop, which features a lofty ceiling and storage areas. Architect's draft plans, presenting extension option are available.
Enjoy comfort as you plan, with ducted heating, gas/electric kitchen with adequate bench and storage space, a large open living/dining area, internal laundry and large entertaining area.
The big mezzanine bedroom includes robes and built-in desks, effectively doubling as a study/office or studio space.
You will also find a bathroom, with a shower, sink, shelves and access to the separate toilet.
Handy inclusions comprise a service lift and three-phase power.
The garage is remote controlled, and leads to the sizeable workshop.
Close to trains, trams, cafes and restaurants, this property presents an exciting opportunity in a fashionable locale. This truly needs to be seen to understand the capacity of its potential.
Insights: 16 other 2 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
THE START OF SOMETHING SPECIAL...
In a quiet street surrounded by other period gems, this double-front freestanding Victorian terrace presents an incredibly unique and exciting renovation opportunity. One-of-a-kind, this solid-brick beauty offers a well-maintained interior comprising three large bedrooms and spacious central lounge, functional kitchen/meals area, bathroom and laundry. Features include gas heating, original Baltic pine floorboards, impressively high ceilings, plus city views from the front verandah and a generous backyard with workshop/storeroom and plenty of room to expand (STCA). A potential-packed period classic in a most enviable city-edge location, its within easy walking distance to Clifton Hill Primary School, Darling Gardens, Queens Parade boutique cafes and shops, trams to the CBD.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Sun-Filled & Secure 70s Sensation
An exceptional one-owner home that's offered for the very first time; this 1970s cream brick classic presents a fabulous opportunity to ease into the groove of village living. With plenty of off-street space to park a few cars, this north-facing freestanding home with wide frontage on a compact allotment offers a generous three bedroom layout enhanced by reverse-cycle air-conditioning, ducted heating, polished floorboards and security shutters. Also includes light-filled living and dining, well-appointed kitchen, bathroom, laundry, paved alfresco courtyard and garden. Live in and enjoy before stylishly improving when ready; this unique property is situated within a short walk to a range of amenities including cafes, shops, schools, trains, parks and trails.
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271

Description:
VICTORIAN BEAUTY, FANTASTIC VILLAGE LIFESTYLE!
Winton - located in the heart of Clifton Hill Village, this attractive balconied terrace presents a fabulously serene city-edge environment of style, space and privacy. Stylish interior features two upstairs bedrooms (including huge master with modern ensuite and front balcony access) and main bathroom with laundry facilities. Downstairs: spacious lounge, study nook, light-filled open dining area and adjoining kitchen with European appliances, plus gas heating and split-system a/c, BIRs in both bedrooms. Double doors open out to a delightfully private backyard garden complete with veggie patches, brick-paved entertaining area and handy storage shed. Positioned for absolute convenience, stroll to Clifton Hill Station, Mayors Park, Queens Parade cafes and boutique shops. What an opportunity!

Description:
Home is Where the Heart Is ...
An irresistible opportunity from the heart of the Clifton Hill village, this charming terrace is an exciting opening for lifestyle lovers wanting to embrace all that this coveted inner-city position has to offer. Nestled on a deep block with secure rear off-street parking, entry-level buyers and investors can immediately reap the benefits while considering further renovation/extension options (STCA) moments to hectares of parkland, cafes, shops, schools and train station. This appealing brick cottage includes two double bedrooms with built-in-robes and ornate ceilings, living and dining area overlooking wide patio, large kitchen, bathroom, laundry, reverse-cycle heating/cooling, polished floorboards, landscaped alfresco area and sunny garden.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
IMMEDIATE PARK FRONTAGE
One of the fortunate few properties in Inner Northern Melbourne with immediate park frontage to Yarra River precinct parklands, this
two level, three bedroom home boasts expansive views to the East from living and terrace areas. Other features include open plan living, study, ground floor courtyard with immediate access to the park, double garage and more. Offered in excellent condition with further cosmetic improvement potential. See it!
Note: No body corporate
